tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clinical_trial_data (
  trial_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name TEXT,
  patient_id UUID,
  patient_age INT,
  patient_gender TEXT,
  trial_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE clinical_trial_data (
    trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    trial_date DATE,
    trial_result VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE TrialResults (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  efficacy DECIMAL(5,2),
  side_effects VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE clinical_trials (trial_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name VARCHAR,
  patient_id UUID,
  trial_date DATE,
  duration INT,
  result VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE patients (patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE drugs (drug_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name VARCHAR,
  manufacturer VARCHAR,
  dosage FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE trial_results (result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_id UUID,
  patient_id UUID,
  efficacy_rating INT,
  side_effects VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE drug_manufacturers (manufacturer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  manufacturer_name VARCHAR,
  headquarters_location VARCHAR,
  contact_number VARCHAR);
